name: City Focus Optometry
tag_list: optometrist, calgary, eye-doctor, downtown-calgary, eye-care, canada, eye-exam, eyewear, eyeglasses, contact-lenses, city-focus-optometry
overview:
City Focus Optometry is located in Downtown Calgary, Alberta, Canada. It is an optometry practice with a group of optometrists who provide eye care and eye exams to residents of the area.

This optometry practice also offers prescriptions for eyeglasses and contact lenses to residents of Calgary, CA.

Take a look at some of the eye care services they offer:

  • Comprehensive eye exams
  • Pediatric eye exams
  • LASIK and eye surgery consultations
  • Contact lens fitting
  • Glaucoma screenings
  • Cataracts evaluation and diagnosis
  • Macular degeneration treatment

The eye doctors at City Focus Optometry use the latest advancements in eye care technology which enables their optometrists to diagnose and treat ocular diseases with greater success.

This Calgary optometry also carries a wide selection of eyewear with designer frames and glasses.

Their contact lenses are offered in many types including:

  • Bifocal contacts
  • Multifocal contact lenses
  • Gas permeable contacts
  • Toric contact lenses for astigmatism

They are located at Elveden Centre downtown and serve the Downtown Calgary area.
